originalText.text: I got the best haircut here, thanks to Kenya! This is my second time, and I’m definitely going back. Kenya was super meticulous, creative, patient, and a total professional. She also took the time to figure out exactly what I wanted and offered great haircare advice. Can’t wait till the next cut!

text.text: I got the best haircut here, thanks to Kenya! This is my second time, and I’m definitely going back. Kenya was super meticulous, creative, patient, and a total professional. She also took the time to figure out exactly what I wanted and offered great haircare advice. Can’t wait till the next cut!

originalText.text: This place is trash. Overpriced. Uses the same brush without cleaning between clients. Carpio did a formula for dying my hair. First time, too dark. Gave him a second chance. Second time, he made my hair brassy colored. So when I went to book another appointment, it was with Kenya, I liked the formula they did. Didn’t leave me brassy, natural, lasted a long time. I came today, Carpio is so PETTY that he refused to use Kenya’s formula which I said I wanted and got an attitude. God forbid someone likes another persons formula better than yours Carpio! The customer is always right! He did his formula he thought would be best for me. Then he gave me a hair cut. I told him i part my hair in the middle and I want long layers and face framing layers. He gave me such subtle  layers I can’t see it. No face framing. He didn’t part my hair in the middle at all even tho I asked him multiple times. He ignored me. This is how this idiot had me walk out of the salon (see the pic). My 5 year old nephew parts straighter than this. I didn’t ask for a 90’s zig zag part bro. I will NOT ever recommend this place or that joke of a stylist Carpio.

originalText.text: I just left this lovely salon with the best haircut of my life! Raven was so wonderful and I could not be happier! The salon was clean and the entire staff was perfect. What a glorious start to my weekend. Thank you Raven and staff!

text.text: I just left this lovely salon with the best haircut of my life! Raven was so wonderful and I could not be happier! The salon was clean and the entire staff was perfect. What a glorious start to my weekend. Thank you Raven and staff!

originalText.text:
Review:

Jasmine is amazing.   My wife has been seeing her for a couple years now and suggested I see her for a cut after growing my hair out for some time.    She was extremely thorough in asking questions on how I wanted my hair cut and shaped before sending me for a great wash with Norelys.  She showed me how to use Avedas styling pomade for maintenance and I went home looking and feeling great.  Great salon.  Friendly staff.   The coffee bar they have at the waiting area was much needed.  Happy wife happy life.   Thank you all.

text.text:
Review:

Jasmine is amazing.   My wife has been seeing her for a couple years now and suggested I see her for a cut after growing my hair out for some time.    She was extremely thorough in asking questions on how I wanted my hair cut and shaped before sending me for a great wash with Norelys.  She showed me how to use Avedas styling pomade for maintenance and I went home looking and feeling great.  Great salon.  Friendly staff.   The coffee bar they have at the waiting area was much needed.  Happy wife happy life.   Thank you all.

originalText.text:
As a woman of color, it's always been daunting to find the perfect stylist who can understand your hair texture. If you have 4a-4c hair, I highly recommend going to Anyelica!

She's been doing my hair professionally since my big chop, and through many haircuts, and color jobs. She's also taken the time to explain what Aveda products I should be using in my hair and they never disappoint. I've never gotten any heat damage either!

If you're a woman of color and hesitant to get you're hair done here, don't be. Ask for her and you'll be more than fine. :)

text.text:
As a woman of color, it's always been daunting to find the perfect stylist who can understand your hair texture. If you have 4a-4c hair, I highly recommend going to Anyelica!

She's been doing my hair professionally since my big chop, and through many haircuts, and color jobs. She's also taken the time to explain what Aveda products I should be using in my hair and they never disappoint. I've never gotten any heat damage either!

If you're a woman of color and hesitant to get you're hair done here, don't be. Ask for her and you'll be more than fine. :)
